column6: You arrive at the swamp. What will you do next?

column7: Nice talking to you! says the monkey.
Nice talking to you! says the tiger.

column6: It is a beautiful day outside. The room is full of sunshine. You decide to go out, and explore the surroundings.
You are at the top of a hill... You notice a windmill and someone nearby.

column7: Nice talking to you! says the inventor. Here are a pair of binoculars and a set of scuba diving. You might find them useful in your journey.
You look through the binoculars and notice a house nearby...

column6: You are at the top of a hill... You notice a windmill and someone nearby.
It is a beautiful day outside. The room is full of sunshine. You decide to go out, and explore the surroundings.
You arrive at the swamp. What will you do next?

column7: The fish thank you for the food and offer you a set of pearls!
You watch the fish... They are swimming in banks...

column6: You arrive at the swamp. What will you do next?
It is a beautiful day outside. The room is full of sunshine. You decide to go out, and explore the surroundings.
You go down until you reach the creative realm. You notice there is a sword dug up in the ground.

column7: You try to pull the sword out of the ground, but it's stuck...
Pushing the sword seems to have moved it a little bit...
Crying out loud won't do any good in this situation...
Thanks for the pearls! says the fairy. You are the best. I would like to give you a lot of strength!

column6: You go down until you reach the creative realm. This is the place where you have found your sword.
It is a beautiful day outside. The room is full of sunshine. You decide to go out, and explore the surroundings.
You are at the entrance of a dragon cave. A large rock is blocking the way in.
You are deep inside the cave. You stand in front of a fierce dragon...
You are deep inside the cave. You stand in front of a weak dragon...
You are at the entrance of a dragon cave.
It is a beautiful day outside. The room is full of sunshine. You decide to go out, and explore the surroundings.
